attributes.action: The Dissolution of Parliament for gross ineptitude and incompetence.
attributes.additional_details:
I write this e-petition in the face of a massive financial collapse looming on the horizon that no Western nations government can or will recognize.

In the shadow of burning buildings and shattered livelihoods in Tottenham, Enfield, Birmingham, Hackney, Clapham and elsewhere.

Brought to our knees by self-indulgent and deluded European Union and its law-makers who seek control when they even control their own greed and grandeur.

Weakened financially by conflicts proxied by oil and money, fed by the lives of British servicemen and the pain of widowed mothers and fatherless sons.

Sitting here with my heart broken; for I see Great Britain destroying itself. Because of YOU and your ignorance. Your weakness. Your profligacy and self-edifying thrift.
Dissolve the Parliament. Call for an end to this government that has so little to offer and provide us other than a snatching hand at our wallets.
